Title: The Tables Have Turned! Perfect-Form Cell Finally Goes into Action
Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Plot: Krillin and Vegeta fight Perfect Cell, as Trunks prepares to reveal his true power. Meanwhile, Goku and Gohan continue training in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber.
